item.title: Coaching
item.description: Improvement is not about doing more things right, but about doing less things wrong. Since my studies I have been a coach for a variety of different athletes. From starters and recreational up to Continental level cyclists & qualifiers for IRONMAN World Championships. I'm interested in getting coached

item.title: Photography
item.description: I have always been interested in the beautiful things in life and aestethics of photos. When my wife was pregnant with our first child I bought myself a camera to be able to capture (hopefully) good pictures of our son and us as a family. This turned, faster then I thought, into a hobby.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello Go! This is a very cool and short text about myself. Ideally it would also be a little bit funny etc. I don’t get why this fucking date does not disappear. Resume # Experience # Company Role Time MATS Product Owner Dec 2022 - Present Saarländischer Radfahrer Bund Mountainbike Federation Coach Oct 2020 - Nov 2022 HYCYS (former STAPS) Sports Scientist & Coach Sep 2017 - Oct 2020 Education # University Degree Year Saarland University MSc Sports Science 2017 Saarland University BA Sports Science 2015
